title: "City 370"
marks: Signature, Title, and Mark bottom margin, LRQ, in pencil: [Kimura Risaburo];
description: abstract, kaleidoscope view of city: purple, blue, red, green, black, and while building forms at LR ad LL; blue, red, and green buildings at bottom center; irregular shapes at bottom center; geometric shapes in middle ground form skyscraper shapes; abstract forms in blue background at R center; large, irregular form with jagged black outline and blue and purple background rises at center and L, punctuated with red, purple, blue, green, and white shapes; two-toned blue square URQ with blue circle riddled with short purple, red, green, and black lines
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Harvey Gross via the Morikami Museum and Japanese Gardens
